description: As a DevOps Engineer, you will lead the automation and reliability of our cloud infrastructure. We are scaling rapidly and need an expert in CI/CD, monitoring, and Kubernetes.
requirements:
- 5+ years of experience in DevOps or system administration
- Deep knowledge of Kubernetes and Docker
- Proficiency with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, or similar)
- Experience with monitoring and logging tools
responsibilities:
- Design and implement CI/CD pipelines
- Maintain and scale Kubernetes clusters
- Automate infrastructure with IaC tools
- Ensure high availability and system reliability
